SEARCH
Package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.service

Interface AbstractUserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserService
public interface AbstractUserService
This interface is implemented by UserService and UserService overrides the methods in this interface.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Optional<User>
    get(UUID key, User requester)
    Gets another user's User instance from their UUID key.
    User
    getCurrentUser()
    Gets current User instance when UserController processes a GET or PUT request.
    User

    Gets or creates User instance when requested.
    User

    Gets User instance by UUID.
    User
    updateUser(User received, User requester)
    Updates the current User instance and then sends the updated user to the cloud.

  • Method Details

    • getOrCreate

      User getOrCreate(String oauthKey, String displayName)
      Gets or creates User instance when requested.
      Parameters:
      oauthKey - oauthKey of a given user.
      displayName - Display name of a given user.
      Returns:
      user

    • getCurrentUser

      User getCurrentUser()
      Gets current User instance when UserController processes a GET or PUT request.
      Returns:
      user The current User instance.

    • getUser

      User getUser(UUID key)
      Gets User instance by UUID.
      Parameters:
      key - UUID
      Returns:
      user User

    • updateUser

      User updateUser(User received, User requester)
      Updates the current User instance and then sends the updated user to the cloud.
      Parameters:
      received - The updated User instance to be PUT into the cloud.
      requester - The User requesting that the instance be updated.
      Returns:
      user

    • get

      Optional<User> get(UUID key, User requester)
      Gets another user's User instance from their UUID key.
      Parameters:
      key - UUID key belonging to another user
      requester - user making the request.
      Returns:
